HTTP/1.0 200 OK
Server: Apache/2.2.3 (Red Hat)
Last-Modified: Fri, 22 Jun 2012 16:33:37 GMT
ETag: "342d6d-63f-4c31231ab9a40"
Content-Type: application/x-javascript
X-Cache-Lookup: HIT from sc2.fccinteractive.com:80
Cache-Control: max-age=300
Date: Thu, 03 Oct 2013 01:49:09 GMT
Content-Length: 1599
Connection: close

function checkArticleCookies(newspaper_id,newspaper_url,registration_required){
        var iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
        iframe.setAttribute("src", "http://tracking.fccinteractive.com/user_tracking/index.php?newspaper_id="+newspaper_id+"&registration_required="+registration_required+"&newspaper_url="+newspaper_url+"&desturl="+window.location.href);
		iframe.style.display = 'none';
        document.getElementById('articleCheck').appendChild(iframe);
}
function checkArticleLogIn(){
        var iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
        iframe.setAttribute("src", "http://tracking.fccinteractive.com/user_tracking/login.php");
        iframe.style.display = 'none';
        document.getElementById('articleCheckLogin').appendChild(iframe);
}
function checkArticleLogOut(){
        var iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
        iframe.setAttribute("src", "http://tracking.fccinteractive.com/user_tracking/logout.php");
        iframe.style.display = 'none';		
        document.getElementById('articleCheckLogout').appendChild(iframe);
}
function checkArticleIsLoggedIn(){    
	var usersession = getCookie('USERSESSION');
    var isLoggedIn = false;
	
    if ( usersession )
    {
        var cookieS = usersession.split(',');
       	for ( var i = 0; i < cookieS.length; i++ )
       	{
            var namevalue = cookieS[i].split('=');
            if ( namevalue[0] == 'isLoggedin' && namevalue[1] == 'true' )
            {
                isLoggedIn = true;
            }
				
        }
    }
	return isLoggedIn; 
}
